body.raw:
{
  "name": "Premium",
  "type": "paid",
  "status": "active",
  "prices": { "monthly": 5000, "quarterly": 14000, "annual": 54000, "currency": "PKR" },
  "features": {
    "staff": true,
    "customers": true,
    "menu": true,
    "orders": true,
    "analytics": true,
    "pos": true,
    "inventory": true,
    "branches": true,
    "recipes": true
  }
}

{ "name": "WelcomeTenant", "channel": "email", "subject": "Welcome to the platform, {{tenantName}}!", "body": "

Hi {{tenantName}}

Your account is ready.

", "variables": ["tenantName"], "status": "active" }

request.description: Creates the first owner user directly in the tenant DB. Useful if you want to bypass invite flow.
Owner clicks email link → paste token into invite_token env var → run this to set password & activate.
Tenant user login. Stores {{auth_token}} automatically for subsequent requests.
Returns the current tenant user. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{auth_token}}.
Sends a reset token via email. Copy token into {{reset_token}} to use with Reset Password.
Use the token received via email to set a new password.

exec: if (id) { pm.collectionVariables.set('branchId', id); console.log('Saved branchId', id); }

request.description: Downloads a CSV header template (optionally with a sample row).

formdata.description: Upload .csv or .xlsx generated from the template

request.description: Bulk import items. Category matched by 'Category Name'. Auto-SKU for blank values.
Exports existing items as CSV with the same columns as the template.
